name: Killer Sanitation
description:
[This project is currently in beta-testing phase. The game is playable BUT without a current working save system]

Welcome to Killer Sanitation: the “No Questions Asked” disposal company! As we like to say, “Nope, we didn’t see anything.”

Run your own disposal company, and destroy materials in the most efficient way possible. Accept or deny job requests from clients, and take on the risk of getting rid of all the evidence before you’re found out! Some requests will be innocent enough. Some … well, we don’t judge. Unlock better equipment, over a dozen upgrades, more land, and hidden easter eggs throughout the game!

Enjoy a quick play-through in this early release of “Killer Sanitation!” This (free) version of the game can be completed in under two hours, with a longer, more robust version currently in the works.

Upcoming Features for Full-Length Game:

  • Difficulty levels for different objects, so specific equipment is required to destroy them
  • Sleep/energy management system
  • Increased threat for suspicion levels
  • Additional equipment (including the "domesticated volcano!")
  • Explosives, potions, and aliens, oh my!
  • Extra Easter Eggs
  • and More!

Please follow to get updates on this game~ and if you like the game or have any constructive feedback I'd love to hear from you!
